name: Bob123
description: i took my son here and he died!!! I will eat your burgers no more!!!! My cat also died and my house burnt down. I have diarrhea and migraines and i cant feel any of my limbs..... i have been hospitalized and my wife left me!!

name: Sarah Townsend
description: very exhausted with all of this and hungry for some good food.
